metadata.name: Tiger Head
metadata.description:
Tiger Head
Exhibition at the Art Museum of the Americas in Washington DC 2021, San Antonio Museum of Art 2021, Mac Panama 2016.

This piece is inspired by my grandfather who arrived at the port of Colón, Panama, in the 1930s from Guangdong, China. He fulfilled his dream to come back to China and his home town after 60 years.

“This elements represents a memory on how my Chinese grandfather gift me batteries for my toys and candy’s on Chinese new years, this memory has been is imprinted on me my whole life”

Using different vintage joysticks as brushes and midi controllers, the artist can manipulate in real time the speed, movement and behavior of the piece.  

https://www.washingtonpost.com/goingoutguide/museums/no-ocean-between-us-art-review/2021/08/03/360f2fe4-ee52-11eb-81d2-ffae0f931b8f_story.html

Cultural Encounters: Art of Asian Diasporas in Latin America & The Caribbean, 1945–Present
https://www.cultural-encounters.org/

@Rozmerel
Rosendo Merel Choy 2016-2022
